text: The 2006 Asian Games, also known as the XV Asian Games, was a sports event in Doha, Qatar. It occurred from 1 December to 15 December, 2006. There were 424 events from 39 sports and disciplines. ==Notes== ==References== Category:2006 in Asia Category:2006 in sports Category:Sport in Qatar Category:December 2006 events Category:Asian Games by year Category:Sport in Doha Category:21st century in Qatar
title: 2006 Asian Games
